name: PositivityISInfectious
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Hosted by Tom Fazio, a thirty-year broadcast veteran, the feature length program presents the positive aspects of living and thinking... seemingly a rare thing these days.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
